thread.section_title: MARAIS HOme Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful établissement
thread.title_full: Wonderful établissement - Review of MARAIS HOme Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: USFRANCE
title: Wonderful établissement
text:
We were welcome very nicely and have book an appointment for the massage for the next day. The same night I went to the hammam and the sauna. It was delightful.
We asked for a breakfast in bed in the morning. It is very pleasant and had a good variety.
The staff is very nice and lovely.
I would recommend for a romantique trip.
